title: Improper error message

profile.name: Legal Robot
profile.about: Automated legal document review using artificial intelligence

vulnerability_information:
Hi team,
First of all congrats for good work to enforced the new password security policy during registration but the password error banner is not updated as per the changes. During registration it only shows the error when i enter the password if is is less than 8 chars. but if i enter the 8+ chars error will say "Please fix this field.". Without knowing the exact error message it will be difficult to put good password. Same error message is showing while signing in.

1) Improper Error message in registration form                                                                                  
1. Click on register.
2. enter password 8+ characters ex. 12345678

2) Improper Error message in sign-in form                                                                                  
1. Click on register.
2. enter your old passowrd if it is simple. (Not possible to sign in)

Please fix this issue as soon as possible, Due to this user will know what's the real problem is happening during sign-in or during registration.

Thanks and regards,
Pratham
vulnerability_information_html:
Hi team,
First of all congrats for good work to enforced the new password security policy during registration but the password error banner is not updated as per the changes. During registration it only shows the error when i enter the password if is is less than 8 chars. but if i enter the 8+ chars error will say "Please fix this field.". Without knowing the exact error message it will be difficult to put good password. Same error message is showing while signing in.

1) Improper Error message in registration form

  1. Click on register.
  2. enter password 8+ characters ex. 12345678

2) Improper Error message in sign-in form

  1. Click on register.
  2. enter your old passowrd if it is simple. (Not possible to sign in)

Please fix this issue as soon as possible, Due to this user will know what's the real problem is happening during sign-in or during registration.

Thanks and regards,
Pratham

activities.message: Thanks for the report. We'll look into changing that error message.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for the report. We'll look into changing that error message.

activities.message: I was expecting a bounty for this issue.. #259742 for incorrect error message u paid before. Hope I will get positive response from your side. Thanks :)
activities.markdown_message: I was expecting a bounty for this issue.. #259742 for incorrect error message u paid before. Hope I will get positive response from your side. Thanks :)

activities.message: Yes, I see the similarity. However, report #259742 contained an actual error. In this report, there is no actual error, but more of a suggestion to write a more clear message.
activities.markdown_message: Yes, I see the similarity. However, report #259742 contained an actual error. In this report, there is no actual error, but more of a suggestion to write a more clear message.

activities.message: Yes @danrubins. But in my case, message was "please fix this field" because of this how user can guess the actual problem. This is user defined error as per the business logic. You enforced the new password policy but user is not aware about the new policy and he/she is using old password set as per the old policy then password will not going to work. It was happened with my account also. That time I was confused what happened to my account, I was hacked or what.? :)
activities.markdown_message: Yes @danrubins. But in my case, message was "please fix this field" because of this how user can guess the actual problem. This is user defined error as per the business logic. You enforced the new password policy but user is not aware about the new policy and he/she is using old password set as per the old policy then password will not going to work. It was happened with my account also. That time I was confused what happened to my account, I was hacked or what.? :)
